body_html: It works on GPU because we do not perform index validation checking on GPU -- it's too expensive. Instead we fill the output with zero for the corresponding value. The CPU version caught the bad index and returned the appropriate error.
body_text: It works on GPU because we do not perform index validation checking on GPU -- it's too expensive.  Instead we fill the output with zero for the corresponding value.  The CPU version caught the bad index and returned the appropriate error.
body: It works on GPU because we do not perform index validation checking on GPU -- it's too expensive.  Instead we fill the output with zero for the corresponding value.  The CPU version caught the bad index and returned the appropriate error.
